### MAU

**%MAU**

$$\frac{MAU_i}{\max(MNE)}$$

### MNAU (minimum number of anatomical units)

MNAU: number of bones or bone portions preserved in sample divided by number of that bone or bone portion in a complete skeleton (Ref.:@Trinkaus 1985, Cannibalism and Burial at Krapina)

**%MNAU** $$\frac{MNAU_i}{\max(MNI)}$$

**ReMNAU** Relative MNAU $$||MNAU||_1 $$
